A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though it is not a Star Wars movie some fans would have hoped for\, it is still a great\, enjoyable movie that set out to do things differently from the same things that has been done before\, either from the original trilogy\, games\, and/or novels. I totally get where this movie is going for\, though there are some unnecessary bits to the story\, it's not as bad of a movie some \"hardcore\" fan said. I agree that this movie raises more questions than answers\, and has various problems with it\, it's still an enjoyable movie that you could watch with your kids.
